lore: While the amount of splash and colour that is found around the world is quite amazing, imagine being able to change the color of certain blocks in world with a simple stroke. While painting blocks for decoration is nice, it can also have a practical use such as separating pipes.
no_lore: Paintbrushes can be used to paint various different blocks into one of 16 colours. Painting a block is normally only useful for decoration, however some blocks have special properties once painted. For example pipes will not connect to other pipes if they are painted different colours.
